desc: This capstone course is for senior majors. Students complete a social work portfolio to illustrate their readiness to begin practice as a generalist social worker. Classes emphasize auxiliary knowledge and skills in leadership. Students discuss emerging social work issues and provide peer assistance with portfolios. Evaluation includes oral presentation, ethics case analyses, portfolio assignments, and analysis of overall mastery of program competencies. Prerequisite: Social Work 380.
name: Soc Worker Professional
notes: This course is open to Senior Social Work majors only.
title: Social Worker as Professional
